akn:section.akn:heading: Qualified High Technology Company interior renovation tax rebate.

akn:content.akn:p: For the purposes of this section, the term:

A tenant that leases or subleases eligible premises taxable under Chapter 8 of this title shall receive, to the extent provided in this section, a rebate of the real property tax paid with respect to the eligible premises for the portion of the tax year that the eligible premises are occupied by the tenant or a directly related entity if:
No later than September 15 of the tax year in which the tax was paid as provided under ยง 47-811, a tenant seeking a rebate pursuant to this section shall submit to the Chief Financial Officer:
Notwithstanding any other provision of this section, the total combined rebate payments per fiscal year for all tenants under this section, beginning in Fiscal Year 2017, shall not exceed $3 million.
